item.title: Help with agility
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Hi.
I need some help… I am making agility for my server, and I actually found out the way to cross obstacles NOT by teleporting!

The solution is… Noclip! But I dont know how to enable noclip on my server just for the time the player crosses than it sets back to block noclippers. What code can i particially enable noclip?

I know something smiliar like this:

if(objectID == The obstacle's ID) { Noclipenabled = true; The walking code... Noclipenabled = false; }And i put a void

if(Noclipenabled == true){ I need help HERE } else if(Noclipenabled == false){ sendmessage("NO NOCLIPPING!"); kick, etc }
Can somebody help me with this?

Read full topic
